scenes.imagePrompt: Nostalgic illustration of a bustling ancient Indian bazaar at dusk. People celebrating a festival. Warm, inviting light. Traditional Indian art style.

Warm illustration of an old halwai (sweet maker) in his small, rustic shop. He is looking thoughtfully at a winding pattern, perhaps a coil of rope or a decorative carving, seeking inspiration. Traditional Indian miniature painting style.

Close-up, cinematic illustration of the halwai squeezing the fermented batter through a cloth bag into a large, shallow iron kadhai filled with bubbling, golden ghee. Steam rising dramatically. Focus on the spiral shape forming.
Magical illustration of bright orange, hot spirals being quickly dipped into a thick, shimmering saffron syrup (chashni) in a brass vessel. The syrup looks glossy and rich. Warm, golden lighting.

Final illustration of a beautiful, ornate brass plate piled high with glistening, fresh Jalebis, garnished with pistachios. Happy, smiling faces of villagers enjoying the sweet in the background. Traditional Indian illustration style.
